subject: Simosonn Pedals F1 2025
description_text:
Good morning. I recently purchased Simsonn pedals, and until now I’ve been playing without any issues. Now I’ve bought F1 2025, and it doesn’t recognize the pedals. Could you tell me if they are compatible with this game and how to make them work? Thank you very much.

conversations.body_text: Hi Borja Garcia Muñiz,  Hello, here is the setup guide for using the SIMSONN Plus X pedals in F1 25: First time entering the game You may see a message: NO PRESET CONTROL SCHEME FOR DEVICE(S) SIMSONN Plus X Please customise your controls in the Settings Menu... Click Okay to continue. Bind controls and save a new scheme Go to Settings → Controls to bind pedals and buttons. When exiting, select Save as new Control Scheme, give it a name (e.g., SIMSONN), and click Save. Manage and switch control schemes Main Menu → Settings → Controls → Control Scheme List Your SIMSONN scheme will appear; you can select it directly for future use. ? Note: If you delete the scheme without backup, you will need to repeat the binding and saving process. After completing these steps, your pedals will work properly in the game, providing a realistic driving experience.
